message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_FULLNAME_SHORT
message.locale: Full name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_FULLNAME_SHORT_PARTIAL_MATCH
message.locale: Full name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters in order to include a wildcard character.

message.name: ERR_PERSONSEARCH_FV_PHONENUMBER_SHORT
message.locale: Phone Number field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).
